name: Salio
description:
Reflex, coordination, intelligence, piece of paper and a pen are what is needed to finish this extremely difficult platformer.Gameplay

Tough levels, interesting mechanics, tight controls, challenging cipher riddles, secrets to find about and many more, all based around a story!Features

    • Story mode with over 100 levels

    • Many different types of cipher riddles to solve

    • Custom mode with your or other player's self-made levels

    • Workshop support

    • Level editor

    • Rewarding achievements

    • Trading cards, badges, emoticons and profile backgrounds availible for draw



"The starting point of all achievements is desire." ~ Napoleon Hill
